title: Womens Dress
title_original: Women's Elegant Knitted Shawl Poncho with Fringed V-Neck Striped Sweater Pullover Cape Gifts for Women Mom

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #47,227 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #720 in Women's Pullover Sweaters

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Sweaters > Pullovers

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the shawl poncho stylish and well-made, appreciating its soft texture and perfect fit that's not too baggy. They describe it as lightweight and perfect for cool evenings, with one customer noting it works well in 50-degree weather. Customers like the colors, with one mentioning the blue/silver/copper striped design, and find it comfortable, with one noting it's not scratchy like other brands.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars great gift idea
items.body: great gift. looks warm and fashionable. good price. lightweight and good length, the gift was given to a lady who is 6ft tall and it fell nicely on her. Arrived on time, nice material. Read more
items.author: Rochelle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I adore this soft, comfy, elegant poncho!
items.body: Looked nice in the photo, great reviews, so bought on impulse. Wow, even better to wear it! So light, soft, enveloping, comfy & stylish - love the muted colors, the beautiful drape. It looks fabulous on, yet is quite durable. I've fallen asleep in it, woke up with it balled under my head, shook it out - no wrinkles, no pilling, no snagging, no sign of wear. Never looks dirty so haven't yet washed, but I'd wash with delicates - no biggy. Perfect for my retro rich hippie aesthetic Read more
items.author: mamasu

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy cover up for cool nights
items.body: I bought a very similar black poncho like this on a cruise ship and fell in love with how soft it was. This red one is no exception. It has a very soft and cozy feel like I'm wearing a cloud and I think it's a great thing to wear to dinner on cool nights when you need a little warmth. It's easy to put on and take off over the head with a generous opening. I am 5' 3" and I think it is a good length on me (not too long or billowy that I would get lost in it). I think with how soft it is, it would be easy to pack even if you are a carry-on packer like me. You can wear this poncho a couple of ways and I think it looks good both ways, but I like to wear mine with the pointed end in the middle because it covers my mid-section. Read more
items.author: CruiseLife247

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous poncho!
items.body: I was surprised at the quality of this beautiful poncho for the price. Very sleek, smooth fabric. Lovely sheen. Looks expensive. Great fit. I have only worn it once and it was very lightweight, but still warm. Perfect weight. Not bulky. Just the right length. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is because it seems like it might be easy to snag. I'm thinking of ordering another one in a different color. It is beautiful! Read more
items.author: Amazoneer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE IT!!!
items.body: FINALLY! A PONCHO THAT DOESN'T SHED AND IS LONG ENOUGH! I BOUGHT IT IN BLACK AND ALSO TEAL. VERY PRETTY!! AND IT CAME READY TO WEAR! NO WRINKLES, NO CREASES, JUST PERFECT!!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND! Read more
items.author: Denise Gauld

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this!
items.body: Absolutely love this. It looks so cute on and it is soft. It's not super warm but its good for a breezy day. Read more
items.author: Millie

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ok, for the Price
items.body: I think this poncho was good, considering it was only $22.11 (tax included). I purchased it on Oct. 10, 2023. Today, November 11, 2023, it's on sale for around $25. Why the price hike? I have washed it 2 times. One thing I watch out for with inexpensive items such as this is "pilling." You know those little round balls that become of the fabric once you washed it a few times. Well, so far, there's none. I'm 5'9" and it fits well. It's lightweight, so it's good for the fall chill. I wear it often in the home, just to help me keep the chill away. Since I paid less just a month ago, I will not be buying any other colors. It says the regular price is about $49. Ridiculous! Read more
items.author: GMH

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Warm, Flattering
items.body: I love this style sweater and the item came just as described/shown. Soft and not too think or heavy to wear; I throw it on over a long sleeves tee for a function yet warm winter look. I received a double mastectomy this past year and it’s been hard to find flattering tops that don’t highlight the tummy that now shows because I have such a flat chest. This sweater style is wonderful. Read more
items.author: Rachael

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 1-olivegray, 1-khaki, Orange, Hooded Grey, 1-black, 1-olive, Beige, Hooded Navy, 1-pinkthread, Hooded Beige, Light Pink, Mustard Yellow, Teal, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
